alert.note: Alert for Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:20PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lander, southwestern Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 445 PM PDT... At 420 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over Emigrant Pass, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Argenta, Crescent Valley, Emigrant Pass, Dunphy, Beowawe, Palisade and Mule Canyon Reclamation Project. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
